contentrichtext.text: Professor '''David Bates''' (born 1945) is a [[United Kingdom|British]] [[historian]]. He was Professor of [[Medieval]] History at the [[University of Glasgow]] from 1994 until 2003. He then took up the post of director of the [[Institute of Historical Research]] at the [[University of London]] between 2003 and 2008, and now holds a chair in Medieval History at the University of East Anglia. ==External links== *{{worldcat id|lccn-n81-101729}} {{Authority control|VIAF=97654933}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Bates, David | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1945 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bates, David}} [[Category:1945 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:British historians]] {{UK-historian-stub}}
